title: Officina
content:
Hi there.

The company I work for has recently chosen to use Officina in all branding.

We have purchased the standard family package but this didn't include a light weight.

The problem we have come across is that the only light version of Officina I can find is a Display cut which does differ from the original, especially the serif I which is important as this letter is in our name.

Is there another light version out there which I have missed.

Thanks Jon
author: cuttin shapes

comments.content: Unfortunately, there is no Light font of [ITC Officina](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822224040/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_officina_std_complete_vp/). It's probably too late to change, but [Spiekermann's](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822224040/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann) later release [FF Unit](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822224040/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_unit_complete_collection_ot/) includes Light and Thin weights.
